item.description: In vow driver, there is a possible memory corruption due to a race condition. This could lead to local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS05852822; Issue ID: ALPS05852822.

item.description: In vow, there is a possible read of uninitialized data due to a improper input validation. This could lead to local information disclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is no needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS05837742; Issue ID: ALPS05857289.

item.description: In vow driver, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a stack-based buffer overflow. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS05837793; Issue ID: ALPS05837793.
